org.easybatch.tutorials.intermediate.load

Class TransactionProcessingEventListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.easybatch.tutorials.intermediate.load.TransactionProcessingEventListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RecordProcessorEventListener

    public class TransactionProcessingEventListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements RecordProcessorEventListener
    A record processing event listener that handles database transactions. This implementation is kept simple for demonstration purpose. In production environment, you may define a commit interval to avoid performance issues of committing the transaction after each record insertion.
    Author:
    Mahmoud Ben Hassine (mahmoud@benhassine.fr)
